input.sentences: she was overjoyed all her friends showed up .
there was a lot of food at the party .
everyone helped themselves to all the food .
they went onto the living room and told some stories .
she was laughing at some of the gifts they gave her .
output.sentences: Our friends were overjoyed when it came time for food.
There was definitely alot of food to go around.
Everyone helped themselves to the food.
We all enjoyed telling stories of how living life is crazy.
After we laughed it was time for our friend to open gifts.
